text: for almost two decades one person has
ruled women surfing I'm Layne Beachley
I'm seven times while surfing champion

of all time passes the torch to another
generation after being on the asp

finally decided to retire and from

end initially the decision to retire
stemmed from having the opportunity to
do many other things outside of the

no longer the best surfer in the world
